revisions.rev:
This is a '''list of people whose career was all or part in [[Illinois]]'''; people are not included if they left the state before beginning a career.
{{compactTOC2}}
==A== [[File:John Ashcroft.jpg| thumb|180px|[[John Ashcroft]]]] * [[Flozell Adams]], offensive tackle for the [[Pittsburgh Steelers]] * [[Jane Addams]], social worker, teacher, peace activist, [[Nobel Peace Prize]] recipient * [[George Ade]], author * [[Paul Adelstein]], television actor; ''[[Prison Break (TV series)|Prison Break]]'', ''[[Private Practice (TV series)|Private Practice]]'' * [[Dankmar Adler]], architect * [[Abraham Adrian Albert]], mathematician * [[Nelson Algren]], author * [[Saul Alinsky]], founder of modern [[community organizing]] and writer * [[Joan Allen]], actress, ''[[The Bourne Ultimatum (film)|The Bourne Ultimatum]]'', ''[[The Bourne Supremacy (film)|The Bourne Supremacy]]'', ''[[Face/Off]]'' * [[Karen Allen]], actress, ''[[Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull]]'', ''[[Raiders of the Lost Ark]]'' * [[Tony Allen (basketball)|Tony Allen]], swingman for the [[Memphis Grizzlies]] * [[Justin Allgaier]], sports, [[2008 ARCA RE/MAX Series|2008]] [[ARCA RE/MAX Series]] Champion * [[Samuel King Allison|Samuel Allison]], prominent [[physicist]] who worked on the [[Manhattan Project]] * [[John Peter Altgeld]], politician (Democrat), Illinois Governor and workplace safety advocate * [[Philip Warren Anderson]], Nobel Prize-winning [[physicist]] * [[Ann-Margret]], Emmy-winning actress, singer and dancer * [[Philip Danforth Armour]], businessman-Founder of [[Armour and Company]] * [[Matthew John Armstrong]], television actor; ''[[Heroes (TV series)|Heroes]]'', ''[[American Dreams]]'' * [[Louis Armstrong]], jazz musician * [[John Ashcroft]], politician (Republican), [[U.S. Attorney General]], [[Missouri]] [[United States Senate|Senator]], [[Missouri Governor]] * [[Jason Avant]], wide receiver for the [[Philadelphia Eagles]] * [[Bill Ayers]], founder and former member of the [[Weather Underground]] * [[Reiko Aylesworth]], actress, [[Michelle Dessler]] on ''[[24 (TV series)|24]]''
